faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Frequently Asked Questions offers a quick answers to common queries, guiding users through features and functionalities efficiently.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Quickly understand the platform and testing flow. Categories on the left, Q&A on the right.

general.title: General
general.desc: Common questions about the test flow and reports.
general.q1: How long does the test take?
general.a1: It usually takes 5-10 minutes. Stay focused and answer honestly.
general.q2: Will my report be kept long term?
general.a2: Reports and history are stored in your account and can be viewed anytime.
general.a3: Optimized for mobile and desktop. You can complete the test on any device.

integration.title: Integrations
integration.desc: Integration with LMS or enterprise systems.
integration.q1: Do you support LMS gradebook integration?
integration.a1: We can export assessment results and connect to common LMSs. Contact support for details.
integration.a2: We provide read and write REST APIs. Keys are required to use them.
integration.q3: How do I sync users and courses?
integration.a3: Via batch import or API sync, with scheduled jobs supported.

account.title: Account & Security
account.q1: What if I forget my password?
account.a1: Use the "Forgot password" feature on the sign-in page to reset it.
account.q2: How can I delete my account and data?
account.a2: Submit a deletion request in settings. We will process it according to compliance requirements.
account.a3: We use encrypted transport and access control. See our privacy policy for details.

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.a1: Common bank cards and major payment channels are supported.
billing.a2: Refunds can be requested within the policy window. See the user agreement.
billing.a3: Invoices for businesses and individuals are supported. Submit invoice details after the order is completed.

standout.title: What makes our tests different: precision, depth, and clarity
standout.desc: We blend innovation, expertise, and a customer-centric approach, focusing on quality and meaningful growth.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about our mission and team.

hero.title: Guide self-exploration with precision
hero.desc: We believe collaboration leads to outstanding results. With a professional team and a commitment to quality, we work with customers to turn ideas into reality and create solutions that stand the test of time.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: We've gathered the most asked topics to help you quickly understand the platform.
faq.q1: How can I contact your support team?
faq.a1: Use the contact methods on the right to email or call us. We'll respond within 24 hours.
faq.q2: Do courses support live or recorded formats?
faq.a2: Both live and recorded formats are supported, depending on the course and instructor. After purchase, check the course details page.
faq.a3: If the course hasn't started or doesn't meet expectations, submit a refund request within 7 days and we'll process it according to policy.
faq.q4: Do you offer group plans for companies or schools?
faq.a4: Yes, we support group purchasing and custom plans. Contact us to discuss your needs.
faq.q5: Is learning progress and grading tracked?
faq.a5: We provide progress statistics and assessment records. View detailed reports in your dashboard.

userCourseChapters.title: People Leadership vs. Management
userCourseChapters.description: Leadership and management are two distinctive and complementary systems of actions in the business environment. Both are necessary for success in an increasingly complex and volatile business environment.

objective.title: Objective
objective.body: By the end of this lesson, learners will understand the vital role of communication in leadership. They will explore key communication skills including active listening, effective speaking, and providing constructive feedback. Additionally, learners will learn strategies to improve their communication skills in various leadership contexts.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.body: Effective communication is the cornerstone of successful leadership. It involves not just the transmission of information but also ensuring that the intended message is received and understood. For leaders, mastering communication skills is essential for inspiring and motivating teams, setting clear expectations, and building trust.

activeListening.title: Active Listening
activeListening.descriptionBody: Active listening involves fully concentrating, understanding, responding, and then remembering what is being said.
activeListening.applicationBody: Leaders who are active listeners can better understand team needs, anticipate problems, and build stronger relationships.

takeaways.title: Key Takeaways
takeaways.i1: Change management is crucial for the successful implementation of organizational changes.
takeaways.i2: The change management process involves preparing for change, managing the change, and reinforcing the change to ensure it is embedded in the organization.
takeaways.i3: Effective leaders use clear communication, stakeholder engagement, and support mechanisms to facilitate change and overcome resistance.

userCourseLessonComplete.title: Congratulations!
userCourseLessonComplete.desc: You have successfully completed lesson {current} of {courseName} course.

userCourseChapterComplete.title: Congratulations!
userCourseChapterComplete.desc1: You have successfully completed all lessons of our {courseName} course.
userCourseChapterComplete.desc2: Time to see what you've learned and get your certificate.

format.title: Format
format.body: The test consists of 10 multiple-choice questions. Each question has four answer choices, reflecting different attitudes and behaviors related to time management.

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.body: Each answer is assigned a point value. The total score is calculated by summing the points from all answers.

userCourseTest.question: During the 'Storming' stage of team development, a leader should:
userCourseTest.o1: Allow the team to resolve their conflicts without intervening.
userCourseTest.o2: Facilitate open communication and mediate conflicts.
userCourseTest.o3: Focus solely on task execution to avoid delays.
userCourseTest.o4: Establish strict rules to control team dynamics.

userCourseTestComplete.description: Great job! You’ve completed the test. Review your score and continue learning.

primary.title: Self-Esteem Guide: Build a Stronger You!
primary.desc: This exclusive package is designed to empower you to recognize your worth, navigate life's challenges with confidence, and foster healthy relationships.

ebooks.cardTitle: Personal Growth Guidance: Unlock Your Best Self Today!

ebookDetail.title: Top Marketing Skills to Boost Your Brand Engagement and Reach
ebookDetail.intro: In today's competitive digital landscape, building a strong brand presence and engaging effectively with your audience is more important than ever. With countless brands vying for attention, mastering key marketing skills can make the difference between a thriving brand and one that goes unnoticed. This blog explores the essential marketing skills that can elevate your brand’s engagement and broaden its reach.

contentCreation.title: Content Creation and Storytelling
contentCreation.body: Creating valuable content is at the heart of effective marketing. Your brand’s content should not only inform but also inspire and connect emotionally with your audience. Whether through blog posts, videos, or social media updates, a good storyteller can transform a simple message into a memorable narrative that resonates.

keyTakeaway.title: Key Takeaway:
keyTakeaway.body: Invest time in learning to craft compelling stories and produce high-quality, relevant content. It will help your brand stand out and build a loyal audience.

social.title: Social Media Management
social.body: With billions of people on social media platforms, these channels are invaluable for brand engagement. Knowing how to leverage social media platforms effectively can help you reach new audiences, foster community, and create shareable content. Key skills include scheduling, engaging with followers, and staying on top of platform trends and algorithms.

about.title: About the Course
about.body: This course offers a comprehensive introduction to the core building blocks of web development: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You'll start from the basics of structuring web pages, styling them, and adding interactivity. This hands-on approach is designed for beginners and is ideal for those looking to build a strong foundation in front-end web development, whether you’re aspiring to become a professional developer or want to create polished personal websites and projects.

analytics.title: Data Analytics and Insights
analytics.body: Understanding analytics is crucial for measuring the success of your marketing efforts. Platforms like Google Analytics and social media insights help you track website traffic, user behavior, engagement rates, and more. Analyzing this data enables you to make data-driven decisions that refine your marketing strategies and enhance engagement.

video.title: Video Marketing
video.body: Video content has become an essential tool for engaging audiences. It captures attention faster than text, allowing brands to communicate complex information in an easy-to-digest format. Video marketing skills include scriptwriting, editing, and understanding video trends that resonate with your audience.

copywriting.title: Copywriting and Persuasive Communication
copywriting.body: Copywriting is the art of using words to inspire action. From website copy to social media captions, well-crafted copy can attract readers, encourage readers, and drive conversions. Learn to write with your audience in mind and focus on clear, persuasive messaging.

learn.title: What You'll Learn
learn.i1: HTML Fundamentals: Structure and organize web pages using HTML tags, attributes, and elements.
learn.i2: CSS Essentials: Style and layout web pages with CSS, including typography, colors, flexbox, and grid.
learn.i3: JavaScript Basics: Add interactivity with JavaScript fundamentals, including variables, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation.
learn.i4: Responsive Design: Build layouts that adapt to different screen sizes and devices.
learn.i5: Project-Based Learning: Create real-world projects to showcase your skills and deepen your understanding of web development.

require.title: Requirements
require.i1: Computer & Internet Access: A laptop or desktop with a stable internet connection.
require.i2: Basic Computer Skills: Familiarity with using a computer, installing software, and navigating the internet.
require.i3: No Prior Coding Knowledge Required: This course is designed for absolute beginners.

profile.aboutDesc: Type 7 on the Enneagram are often referred to as The Enthusiasts: they are energetic, spontaneous, and optimistic. Their core motivation is to avoid fear, pain, or discomfort, and maintain a sense of new experiences.
profile.triviaQuestion: What is an essential trait for problem-solving?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We value your privacy. Here's how we collect, use, and protect information.

general.title: Overview
general.body: We only collect and process data for lawful, necessary, and explicit purposes, and take reasonable security measures to protect your information.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.desc: The following scenarios describe how information is used.
usage.a1: Used for core functions such as account creation, course access, assessments, and report generation.
usage.a2: Used to send important notices, service updates, and support responses.
usage.a3: Anonymous or aggregated data is analyzed to optimize product experience and performance.

sharing.title: Sharing & Disclosure
sharing.desc: We do not sell your personal information. We share only when necessary:
sharing.a1: Shared with contracted third-party providers for infrastructure and customer support.
sharing.a2: Information may be disclosed to comply with law, protect users, or prevent fraud.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.body: We use cookies to remember preferences and analyze the site. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser, but some functions may be affected.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.body: We may update this policy from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via site notices or email.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: For privacy questions or requests, please reach out using the contact information on the page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: By using this service, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

accept.title: Acceptance of Terms
accept.body: Registering or using the service means you have read and agree to this agreement.

use.title: Use of Service
use.body: Use the service according to applicable laws and this agreement. Do not abuse or disrupt the platform.

account.title: Account & Security
account.body: Keep your credentials safe and are responsible for activity under your account. Notify us immediately if you notice abnormalities.

payments.title: Fees & Payments
payments.body: For paid courses or subscriptions, fees, billing, and refund policies follow the explanations on the pages.

content.title: User Content
content.body: You retain ownership of your content, but authorize us to process and display it as needed to provide the service.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.body: Includes but is not limited to illegal content, rights infringement, attacks, or interference with platform operations.

termination.title: Termination
termination.body: We may suspend or terminate the service if you violate the terms. You may stop using the service at any time and request data export.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: The service is provided as-is. We make no guarantees of suitability or uninterrupted availability. Liability is limited to the extent permitted by law.
